title: The new Samsung Galaxy M33 is an affordable 5G phone with a 120Hz high refresh rate display
content:
Following the launch of three new Galaxy A series devices in India late last month, Samsung has now launched a new Galaxy M series device in the region. The new Galaxy M33 is a budget-friendly 5G phone featuring the Exynos 1280 SoC, a 6.6-inch 120Hz LCD panel, and a massive 6,000mAh battery. It’s a significant

The post The new Samsung Galaxy M33 is an affordable 5G phone with a 120Hz high refresh rate display appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has launched a new affordable 5G phone, the Galaxy M33, in India. It features a 120Hz display, the Exynos 1280 SoC, and a 6,000mAh battery.
